name: Nok out
description:
Currenty has 5 waves with 2 enemy types and a boss fight

Controls : ( Supports WASD, ZQSD and arrow keys )

- R to restart

- AD / QD / left and right arrow = movement

- S / Down arrow key = dodge in the direction you're moving

- Space = attack

- W / Z / Up arrow = target the enemy closest to you in the direction you're facing

( Press again to de-select )

( NOTE : Webgl may have issues, please try windows version if possible )
Like what you see ? :) Follow me on Twitter Join our Discord
